title: Corda Flow Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the flow subsection.

messageResendWindow.description: Length of time to wait before resending unacknowledged flow session messages, in milliseconds

heartbeatTimeout.description: Length of time to wait when no message has been received from a counterparty before causing the session to error, in milliseconds

p2pTTL.description: TTL set on on messages passed to the P2P layer to be sent to a counterparty.
